review:
I am from Delhi and wanted a gynaecologist in Hyderabad since i shifted here.I went to gynae in yashodha earlier but Dr was very rude and unfriendly.
Finally found Dr Mahita through practo. The Dr had a very pleasing personality giving me the first impression to be open and friendly with her.She patiently heard my issue and then was quickly able to understand what i wanted to convey.She gave me enough time and found solution the problem quickly.

I will go to her in the future and keep her as my gynaecologist forever.

One of the best gynaecologist i have seen.

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. Consultation went well.  I am satisfied with the explanation given. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time when we went. It was for 15 minutes. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Doctor spoke well.

I had visited the hospital and it was gynaecology related. Consultation was really good by the doctor. She was soft-spoken, listening to queries I had. It was easy for me to connect with her. I have already recommended doctor to my family and friends. There was more waiting time when we went. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Hospitality was good. I am visiting hospital multiple times. Diet was suggested and she told to come after 2 months.

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Scanning and blood test was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was very friendly.

My sister had met the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. I am satisfied with the explanation  given by the doctor. Initially my appointment was cancelled thrice, that was concern and it could be checked. Tests was done. There was  more  waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 1.5 - 2 hours. Doctor was friendly.
My mother had met the doctor and it was for gynaecology related . Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. She went for review.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Awesome doctor, she has patience and graet experience, freindly with patient, educating to patient about problem is very nice....

My girl friend had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related . Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. We had consultation twice. Tests was done. After 1.5 month we have follow-up visit again.

Since the last 25 days, I am consulting her. She is very good. I am very happy with her. The way she approaches and the treatment everything is perfect. The staff also cooperates very well, Only 30 minutes of the estimated waiting period can be foreseen. But the reception has to be more relevant with their information because, on the last visit, I was seeking some details but I didn't get it on time. Other than that everything is good.
